:::{.callout-note icon=false}
The main results for the Civil Service are the
[benchmark results](../index.qmd), this is the median of participating
organisation scores. The figures presented here are the unweighted mean
scores for all respondents. These results are heavily dominated by the
views of civil servants in the very largest organisations: DWP, HMRC, MOD,
Ministry of Justice and the Home Office.
:::
